bin/hash.c

00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Hash testing
00003  *
00004  * Tests hashing functions.  
00005  *
00006  * @author  John LaRusic
00007  * @ingroup bin
00008  ****************************************************************************/
00009 #include "arrow.h"
00010 
00011 /* Global variables */
00012 char *program_name;             /**< Program name */
00013 char *input_file = NULL;        /**< Given input TSPLIB file */
00014 
00015 /* Program options */
00016 #define NUM_OPTS 1
00017 arrow_option options[NUM_OPTS] = 
00018 {
00019     {'i', "input", "TSPLIB input file", 
00020         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &input_file, ARROW_TRUE, ARROW_TRUE}
00021 };
00022 char *desc = "Tests the hashing functions.";
00023 char *usage = "-i tsplib.tsp";
00024 
00025 /* Main Method */
00026 int 
00027 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00028 {   
00029     arrow_problem problem;
00030     arrow_problem_info info;
00031     arrow_hash hash;
00032     
00033     /* Read program arguments */
00034     if(!arrow_options_parse(NUM_OPTS, options, desc, usage, argc, argv, NULL))
00035         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00036     
00037     /* Try and read the problem file and its info */
00038     if(!arrow_problem_read(input_file, &problem))
00039         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00040     if(!arrow_problem_info_get(&problem, &info))
00041         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00042 
00043     /* Create hash */
00044     if(!arrow_hash_init(info.cost_list, info.cost_list_length, &hash))
00045     {
00046         arrow_print_error("Could not create hash.");
00047         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00048     }
00049     
00050     int i, j, cost, key;
00051     for(i = 0; i < problem.size; i++)
00052     {
00053         for(j = i + 1; j < problem.size; j++)
00054         {
00055             cost = problem.get_cost(&problem, i, j);
00056             key = arrow_hash_search(&hash, cost);
00057             printf("C[%d,%d] = %d; l[%d] = %d\n", 
00058                 i, j, cost, key, info.cost_list[key]);
00059         }
00060     }
00061     
00062     /* Free up the structures */
00063     arrow_hash_destruct(&hash);
00064     arrow_problem_info_destruct(&info);
00065     arrow_problem_destruct(&problem);
00066     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00067 }
